how <S%G4459><s%> <S%G1628>shall<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1628>escape<s%>, if <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G272>neglect<s%> so <S%G5082>great<s%> a <S%G4991>salvation<s%>? <S%G3748>which<s%> having <S%G2983>at<s%> the <S%G746>first<s%> been <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> them that <S%G191>heard<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> might <S%G525>deliver<s%> all <S%G5128>them<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G2198>lifetime<s%> <S%G1777>subject<s%> to <S%G1397>bondage<s%>.
